\begin{tasks} (2)
	\task $\sum_{k=1}^n \ln\left(1+\dfrac {1}{k}\right)$
	\task $\prod_{k=2}^n \left(1-\dfrac{1}{k^2}\right)$
	\task $\sum_{k=0}^n \dfrac{1}{(k+2)(k+3)}$.
